title: Question about server transfers
body:
Hey, I want to server transfer but I have some questions. I assume all my skins,wards and shards are going to transfer along with my account but will my champion levels (masteries) transfer aswell? Also, does it reset your rank and honor level aswell?

Sorry if the question is dumb Im just a bit new to this kinda stuff {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: Server transfer will still be down until about Nov 20th due to the end of season and making sure the better rewards goes over smoothly for everyone.

Everything transfers.

The only think I lost in all my transfers was my honor, but this was before the new honor rework.
Everything is kept the same, your skins/wards/shards and your mastery points.

Do not worry about all that.
However transfers are not open until the 20th to allow the ranked rewards to be fully completed.
